languages.text: "Да славится имя фон Валанциус в анналах Империума! Да защитит Бог-Император сию династию от бед и напастей! Благороднейш{mf|ий|ая} {name} фон Валанциус, слава о вашей праведности и прилежании в служении Ему достигает самых дальних уголков Простора Коронус. Негоже, чтобы подобный святой человек странствовал среди звезд, не имея надежной духовной опоры. Мы здесь для того, чтобы исправить это".

traits.locale_text: "Да славится имя фон Валанциус в анналах Империума! Да защитит Бог-Император сию династию от бед и напастей! Благороднейш{mf|ий|ая} {name} фон Валанциус, слава о вашей праведности и прилежании в служении Ему достигает самых дальних уголков Простора Коронус. Негоже, чтобы подобный святой человек странствовал среди звезд, не имея надежной духовной опоры. Мы здесь для того, чтобы исправить это".

languages.text: "Long may the von Valancius name be praised in the annals of the Imperium! May the God-Emperor protect this dynasty from peril and adversity! Noble {name} von Valancius, word of your righteousness and diligence in serving Him has spread to the farmost corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be folly to let a paragon such as you travel among the stars without firm spiritual support. We are here to correct this egregious oversight."
languages.original_text: "Да славится имя фон Валанциус в анналах Империума! Да защитит Бог-Император сию династию от бед и напастей! Благороднейш{mf|ий|ая} {name} фон Валанциус, слава о вашей праведности и прилежании в служении Ему достигает самых дальних уголков Простора Коронус. Негоже, чтобы подобный святой человек странствовал среди звезд, не имея надежной духовной опоры. Мы здесь для того, чтобы исправить это".

traits.locale_text: "Long live von Valancius among the annals of the Imperium! May God-Emperor protect the dynasty from threats and misfortunes! Noble {name} von Valancius, the word about your righteousness and diligence in serving Him reaches the most distant corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be horrible to let such a holy person like you travel among the stars not having a firm spiritual support. We are here to fix this."

"Long live von Valancius among the annals of the Imperium! May God-Emperor protect the dynasty from threats and misfortunes! Noble {name} von Valancius, the word about your righteousness and diligence in serving Him reaches the most distant corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be horrible to let such a holy person like you travel among the stars not having a firm spiritual support. We are here to fix this."

"Long live von Valancius among the annals of the Imperium! May the God-Emperor protect this dynasty from threats and misfortunes! Noble {name} von Valancius, word of your righteousness and diligence in serving Him reaches the most distant corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be heresy to let such a holy person as you travel among the stars without firm spiritual support. We are here to fix that."

"Long live von Valancius among the annals of the Imperium! May the God-Emperor protect this dynasty from threats and misfortunes! Noble {name} von Valancius, word of your righteousness and diligence in serving Him reaches the most distant corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be heresy to let such a holy person as you travel among the stars without firm spiritual support. We are here to fix that."

"Long may the von Valancius name be praised in the annals of the Imperium! May the God-Emperor protect this dynasty from peril and adversity! Noble {name} von Valancius, word of your righteousness and diligence in serving Him has spread to the farmost corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be folly to let a paragon such as you travel among the stars without firm spiritual support. We are here to correct this egregious oversight."

languages.text: “冯·瓦兰修斯家族将在帝国史册上永垂不朽！愿神皇保佑冯·瓦兰修斯王朝免于一切威胁与灾祸！尊贵的{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，您的正义与勤勉已经传遍了科罗努斯扩区最遥远的角落。若是让您这样的圣者，在没有坚实的精神支柱的情况下遨游群星，这简直是可怕的愚行。我们来这里，就是为了纠正这方面的疏忽。”
languages.original_text: "Long may the von Valancius name be praised in the annals of the Imperium! May the God-Emperor protect this dynasty from peril and adversity! Noble {name} von Valancius, word of your righteousness and diligence in serving Him has spread to the farmost corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be folly to let a paragon such as you travel among the stars without firm spiritual support. We are here to correct this egregious oversight."

traits.locale_text: “冯·瓦兰修斯家族将在帝国史册上永垂不朽！愿神皇保佑冯·瓦兰修斯王朝免于一切威胁与灾祸！尊贵的{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，您的正义与勤勉已经传遍了科罗努斯扩区最遥远的角落。若是让您这样的圣者，在没有坚实的精神支柱的情况下遨游群星，这简直是可怕的愚行。我们来这里，就是为了纠正这方面的疏忽。”

languages.text: « Puisse l'auguste nom de von Valancius marquer durablement de son empreinte les annales de l'Imperium ! Puisse l'Empereur-Dieu protéger cette dynastie face au danger et à l'adversité ! Noble {name} von Valancius, les échos de votre droiture et de vos efforts assidus pour servir honorablement Sa volonté ont atteint les mondes les plus reculés des Étendues de Koronus. Laisser un tel parangon de vertu voyager parmi les étoiles sans aucun soutien spirituel relèverait de la folie pure. Nous sommes ici pour réparer cette impardonnable négligence. »
languages.original_text: "Long may the von Valancius name be praised in the annals of the Imperium! May the God-Emperor protect this dynasty from peril and adversity! Noble {name} von Valancius, word of your righteousness and diligence in serving Him has spread to the farmost corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be folly to let a paragon such as you travel among the stars without firm spiritual support. We are here to correct this egregious oversight."

traits.locale_text: « Puisse l'auguste nom de von Valancius marquer durablement de son empreinte les annales de l'Imperium ! Puisse l'Empereur-Dieu protéger cette dynastie face au danger et à l'adversité ! Noble {name} von Valancius, les échos de votre droiture et de vos efforts assidus pour servir honorablement Sa volonté ont atteint les mondes les plus reculés des Étendues de Koronus. Laisser un tel parangon de vertu voyager parmi les étoiles sans aucun soutien spirituel relèverait de la folie pure. Nous sommes ici pour réparer cette impardonnable négligence. »

languages.text: 「帝国の年代記におけるフォン・ヴァランシウスよ栄光あれ！神帝陛下が本王朝を脅威と不運からお守りくださいますよう！高貴なる{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスよ、あなたの正義とかのお方にお仕えする尽力は、コロヌス・エクスパンスの最果てまでも届いておりますぞ！あなたのような神聖な人物を、堅牢な神的加護もなく星々を航行させるのは異端にあたるものでありましょう。私たちはそれを正すためにやって来たのです」
languages.original_text: "Long may the von Valancius name be praised in the annals of the Imperium! May the God-Emperor protect this dynasty from peril and adversity! Noble {name} von Valancius, word of your righteousness and diligence in serving Him has spread to the farmost corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be folly to let a paragon such as you travel among the stars without firm spiritual support. We are here to correct this egregious oversight."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の年代記におけるフォン・ヴァランシウスよ栄光あれ！神帝陛下が本王朝を脅威と不運からお守りくださいますよう！高貴なる{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスよ、あなたの正義とかのお方にお仕えする尽力は、コロヌス・エクスパンスの最果てまでも届いておりますぞ！あなたのような神聖な人物を、堅牢な神的加護もなく星々を航行させるのは異端にあたるものでありましょう。私たちはそれを正すためにやって来たのです」

languages.text: «¡Que la dinastía von Valancius goce largo tiempo de alabanzas en los anales del Imperium! ¡Que el Dios Emperador proteja la dinastía contra peligros y adversidades! Noble {name} von Valancius, noticias de su justicia y diligencia al servicio del Emperador se propagan a los rincones más recónditos de la Extensión de Koronus. Sería una herejía dejar que semejante dechado de virtudes viajara entre las estrellas sin un apoyo espiritual adecuado. Hemos venido para remediar esta lamentable omisión».
languages.original_text: "Long may the von Valancius name be praised in the annals of the Imperium! May the God-Emperor protect this dynasty from peril and adversity! Noble {name} von Valancius, word of your righteousness and diligence in serving Him has spread to the farmost corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be folly to let a paragon such as you travel among the stars without firm spiritual support. We are here to correct this egregious oversight."

traits.locale_text: «¡Que la dinastía von Valancius goce largo tiempo de alabanzas en los anales del Imperium! ¡Que el Dios Emperador proteja la dinastía contra peligros y adversidades! Noble {name} von Valancius, noticias de su justicia y diligencia al servicio del Emperador se propagan a los rincones más recónditos de la Extensión de Koronus. Sería una herejía dejar que semejante dechado de virtudes viajara entre las estrellas sin un apoyo espiritual adecuado. Hemos venido para remediar esta lamentable omisión».

languages.text: "Möge der Name von Valancius in den Annalen des Imperiums lang gepriesen werden! Möge der Gottimperator diese Dynastie vor Unglück und Gefahren bewahren! {mf|Nobler|Noble} {name} von Valancius, die Kunde davon, wie rechtschaffen und beflissen Ihr ihm dient, dringt selbst in die entlegensten Winkel der Koronus-Ausdehnung vor. Es wäre Narretei, ein solch leuchtendes Vorbild wie Euch ohne feste spirituelle Unterstützung durch die Sterne reisen zu lassen. Wir sind hier, um dieses schändliche Versäumnis zu korrigieren."
languages.original_text: "Long may the von Valancius name be praised in the annals of the Imperium! May the God-Emperor protect this dynasty from peril and adversity! Noble {name} von Valancius, word of your righteousness and diligence in serving Him has spread to the farmost corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be folly to let a paragon such as you travel among the stars without firm spiritual support. We are here to correct this egregious oversight."

traits.locale_text: "Möge der Name von Valancius in den Annalen des Imperiums lang gepriesen werden! Möge der Gottimperator diese Dynastie vor Unglück und Gefahren bewahren! {mf|Nobler|Noble} {name} von Valancius, die Kunde davon, wie rechtschaffen und beflissen Ihr ihm dient, dringt selbst in die entlegensten Winkel der Koronus-Ausdehnung vor. Es wäre Narretei, ein solch leuchtendes Vorbild wie Euch ohne feste spirituelle Unterstützung durch die Sterne reisen zu lassen. Wir sind hier, um dieses schändliche Versäumnis zu korrigieren."

languages.text: "Von Valancius adı, İmparatorluk yıllıklarında her daim övgüyle anılsın! Tanrı İmparator, bu hanedanlığı tehlikelerden ve badirelerden korusun! Asil {name} von Valancius; doğruluğunuz ve O'na hizmette gösterdiğiniz gayretiniz, Koronus Enginliği'nin en ücra köşelerinde bile bilinir oldu. Sizin gibi örnek bir şahıs, yıldızlar arasında seyahat ederken manevi destekten yoksun kalmamalı. Bu korkunç eksikliği gidermek için buradayız."
languages.original_text: "Long may the von Valancius name be praised in the annals of the Imperium! May the God-Emperor protect this dynasty from peril and adversity! Noble {name} von Valancius, word of your righteousness and diligence in serving Him has spread to the farmost corners of the Koronus Expanse. It would be folly to let a paragon such as you travel among the stars without firm spiritual support. We are here to correct this egregious oversight."
